item.title: Maria add a quote by Rita Williams-Garcia
item.description: "Today we're going to be like the earth, spinning around and affecting many." -- Rita Williams-Garcia

item.title: Maria add a quote by Isabel Allende
item.description: "Before you conquer the mountain, you must learn to overcome your fear." -- Isabel Allende

item.title: Maria add a quote by Isabel Allende
item.description: "My father says that fear is good; it's the body's alarm system, it warns us of danger. But sometimes danger can't be avoided, and then you have to forget about being afraid." -- Isabel Allende

item.title: Maria add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Have you ever lost someone you love and wanted one more conversation, one more chance to make up for the time when you thought they would be here forever? If so, then you know you can go your whole life collecting days, and none will outweigh the one you wish you had back." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Maria add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "When someone is in your heart, they're never truly gone. They can come back to you, even at unlikely times." -- Mitch Albom
